price: Ajajni keenya waantaane takka malee akkuma liphsuu ijaa.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
